mapper.insert: insert into seat_inventories (id, event_id, seat_type_id, seat_num, status, version, created_at, updated_at) values (#{id,jdbcType=OTHER,typeHandler=com.ds.ticketmaster.config.database.UUIDTypeHandler}, #{eventId,jdbcType=OTHER,typeHandler=com.ds.ticketmaster.config.database.UUIDTypeHandler}, #{seatTypeId,jdbcType=OTHER,typeHandler=com.ds.ticketmaster.config.database.UUIDTypeHandler}, #{seatNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
